topic.title: Qodana Cloud components
topic.p: In Qodana Cloud, an organization is the basic entity. Every Qodana Cloud user can be part of one or multiple organizations.
Each organization can contain several teams. Each team provides unified access to projects for several users.
Each project contains results of inspection carried out by Qodana over a specific codebase.
To start receiving Qodana reports and overview them in the Qodana Cloud UI, follow these steps:

list.li: Configure forwarding of reports from Qodana
